original_text: Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that if anyone knew where he was, he should let them know, so that they might arrest him.
korean_text: 이는 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 누구든지 예수 있는 곳을 알거든 신고하여 잡게 하라 명령하였음이러라

sentences.original_text: Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders
that if anyone knew where he was
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누가 그가 어디 있는지 알면

sentences.original_text: so that they might arrest him
